Title: Four Horsemen
Plot: After seeing a broadcast via satellite from Asia, Jake gathers a group of people together for information gathering.  After finding out that there is information out there, Jake suggests having four search parties to go out to get a better understanding what is going on outside of Jericho.  The search parties set off in four different directions.
GuestStars: Mackenzie Hannigan, Xiaobin Jiang, James Eckhouse, Bobby Stephenson
